name: Megadimension Neptunia VIIR - 4 Goddesses Online Legendary Weapon Set | 四女神オンライン 伝説級 武器セット | 四女神Ｏｎｌｉｎｅ 傳說級 武器套組
detailed_description:
Legen... wait for it... Need the best of the best? The 4 Goddesses Online Legendary Weapon Set has the perfect weapon for the best Goddesses! Each Goddesses gets 3 weapons to choose from! The 4 Goddesses Online Legendary Weapon Set includes:

Neptune
Holy Sword Artificial
Holy Sword Excalibur
Evil Sword Caliburn

Noire
Blue Sword Hrotti
Shining Sword Valkyria
Dark Persephone

Blanc
Arch Bishop Rod
Holy Staff Asclepius
Diabolical Caduceus

Vert
Evil Spear Gaebolg
Holy Spear Longinus
Dark Spear Rune

...dary!

fullgame.name: Megadimension Neptunia VIIR | 新次元ゲイム ネプテューヌＶⅡＲ | 新次元遊戲 戰機少女ＶⅡＲ

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7, 32bit, 64bit
  • Processor: Intel i5 2.3 GHz or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with 1GB VRAM or more and compatibility with Direct X 11.0 or higher
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 9 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Direct Sound compatible sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel i5 3.3 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960、ATI Mobility Radeon R9 290 or greater
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 9 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Direct Sound compatible sound card
